description: This file defines an Angular component 'FoliosListComponent' responsible for displaying a list of folios in an analyst interface, including features for sorting, navigation, and displaying empty states.

classes.name: FoliosListComponent
classes.description: Angular component for listing analyst's folios with functionality for sorting, creating new folios, and managing state.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component and triggers data load.

methods.name: goNew
methods.description: Navigates to the new folio creation page, with SSR-safe fallback.

methods.name: onSort
methods.description: Sets the sort key and triggers sorting of folios.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads folio data from the FolioService and updates the component state.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Sorts the folios array based on the selected sort key.

ctags.name: Folio
ctags.pattern: /^    const key = this.sortKey as keyof Folio;$/

ctags.name: g
ctags.pattern: /^      const g = globalThis as unknown as { location?: { href: string } };$/

ctags.name: key
ctags.pattern: /^    const key = this.sortKey as keyof Folio;$/
